name: David Ramirez
text: I still haven't finished the most recent book. I wish he'd just arranged everything chronologically  and split it off that way, instead of doing one set of characters and then doing the same period of time over with the other set of characters--for  me, it seriously breaks the flow, even more so than just having a bazillion characters and plots going on simultaneously.
